title: Algae Growth on Greenland’s Ice Contributes to Melting, Studies Show
summary_full: New studies show how algae grows on ice and snow, creating “dark zones” that exacerbate melting in the consequential region.
summary_public: New studies show how algae grows on ice and snow, creating “dark zones” that exacerbate melting in the consequential region.
